poem:
### Common Ground

Drawn lines in the desert sand,  
whispers of desperation carried  
by the wind,  
footsteps merging, alongside shadows  
of forgotten dreams.  
They speak of walls, as unity stands  
quiet, waiting—  
a shared breath, of toil and hope,  
heartbeats of the same land,  
marching against the tide.
